description: The 4-star Eurostars Porto Douro is located in the city of Porto facing the Douro River, just a 3-minute walk from the UNESCO World Heritage Ribeira and the D. Luís I Bridge. A breakfast buffet is served every morning and, upon request, breakfast may be served in the room. Within walking distance, guests will find a variety of restaurants serving traditional local cuisine as well as a plenty of bars and snack-bars. In addition, the hotel features a bar where guests can relax in the evening. With a 24-hour front desk providing a variety of services and information, The Eurostars Porto Douro also features 3 meeting rooms, ideal for conferences and business events. The São Bento Train Station is 950 metres away and Porto International Airport is 15 km away.

description: Located in Porto, the 4-star Eurostars Heroismo is just in front of Heroismo Metro Station and also has an outstanding parking. Featuring a work desk, the comfortable rooms at the Heroismo are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV, as well as WiFi access and a minibar. Each bathroom includes a bath or shower and comes with a hairdryer, as well as free toiletries. Breakfast service is available each morning at the Eurostars restaurant, featuring a variety of fresh local products. Guests of the hotel can find a wide range of popular restaurants and eateries in Porto’s historic centre, which is a short metro ride away. Room service is also available, at an extra fee. Following a day of discovering the city, guests are welcome to unwind in the lounge area and enjoy a cocktail or drink from the on site bar. Eurostars Heroismo provides a multitude of services to its guests, such as a lounge, bar, laundry, ironing, daily cleaning and a 24-hour front desk. Meeting rooms and a business centre are also featured. Porto’s historic Clérigos Tower and São Bento Train Station are within a 15-minute walk. At a 20-minute walk are the lively Galerias de Paris, Porto’s main bar area, where patrons can enjoy their drinks indoors or on the pedestrian street facing the establishments. Campanhã Train Station is just one metro stop away from Heroísmo. The Eurostars Heroismo is 19.5 km from Porto’s Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport, which can be reached within 35 minutes via metro.

Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at NEYA Porto Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near NEYA Porto Hotel include Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Porto, 100 metres from the Santa Catarina Street, The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel is a 5-star hotel with a confortable and contemporary ambience. It offers free WiFi in all areas. The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel features 17 spacious and modern air-conditioned rooms equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, safety deposit box and a minibar. Each room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. Functioning as a school-hotel for the students of the Porto School of Tourist, The Artist includes a restaurant with a varied menu, a bar and room service. With 24-hour front desk, The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel offers facilities like a business centre, a meeting room and laundry service. Major attractions of the city are within walking distance including the Clérigos Tower, the Lello Bookstore and the Bolhão Market. The 24 de Agosto Metro Station is 450 metres away and the São Bento Train Station is 1.2 km away. Porto International Airport is 17 km away.

name: HF Tuela Porto
address: Rua Arquitecto Marques Da Silva, 200, 4150-483 Porto, Porto
description: Situated at 10 minutes’ walk from the Douro River, HF Tuela Porto is located in Boavista, just 3 km from Porto's historic centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All of the rooms at the property include a cable TV, air conditioning a a private bathroom. Guests can relax in the hotel bar, and there are also many restaurants and bars in the immediate vicinity of the hotel. Nearby attractions include the Palacio de Cristal gardens, which feature panoramic Douro River views. The popular Península shopping centre is 5 minutes’ walk away. HF Tuela Porto is located just 4 km from the iconic Dom Luis I Bridge, which connects with Vila Nova de Gaia's riverside, the site of the Port Wine Cellars. It is a 15-minute drive from Porto International Airport.

name: Exe Almada Porto
address: Rua do Almada 361, Porto 4050-032, 0000 Porto, Porto
description: Well situated in Porto, Exe Almada Porto offers air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features a concierge service, and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, every room includes a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units feature a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, American and gluten-free options. Popular points of interest near Exe Almada Porto include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Moon & Sun Porto
address: R. De Sá De Noronha 70, 4050-190 Porto, Porto
description: Well set in the centre of Porto, Hotel Moon & Sun Porto provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms include a safety deposit box and selected rooms include city views. All units will provide guests with a minibar. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available daily at Hotel Moon & Sun Porto. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Hotel Moon & Sun Porto include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Eurostars Das Artes
description: Partly housed in a modern building and partly in a historical palace with a tiled façade, Das Artes is centrally located in Porto. It offers design-conscious accommodation with rotating art exhibitions. The guest rooms of the Hotel Das Artes are carefully furnished and feature hardwood floors. They all include free internet, air conditioning and a cable TV. A popular breakfast prepared using seasonal ingredients is served daily at the restaurant. Guests can enjoy a glass of classic port wine in the hotel’s bar or relax in the garden area. A concierge service is available and can arrange car and bicycle rental. Hotel Das Artes hotel is a 5-minute walk from most local cultural institutions, including the Jardins do Palacio de Cristal and the Museu Nacional De Soares Dos Reis. Ponte Dom Luis Bridge is a 7-minute drive away.

name: Pousada do Porto - Rua das Flores
description: Well located in the centre of Porto, Pousada do Porto - Rua das Flores provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Situated conveniently in the União de Freguesias do Centro district, this hotel offers a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation features room service and a concierge service for guests. At the hotel, each room has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available daily at Pousada do Porto - Rua das Flores. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Pousada do Porto - Rua das Flores.

name: TRYP by Wyndham Porto Centro Hotel
description: TRYP by Wyndham is a select-service upper-midscale hotel brand with over 100 locations tucked in the heart of some of the most dynamic and cosmopolitan cities in Europe and the Americas. TRYP hotels cater to both business and leisure travelers who value quality of life with professional excellence, by offering several specialty guest rooms, including Family Rooms with bunk beds and Fitness Rooms with exercise equipment. TRYP offers a unique experience that encourages guests to enjoy the city, socialize and live life to the fullest.Wyndham

name: Malmerendas Boutique Lodging
address: Rua Dr. Alves Da Veiga, 186, 4000-072 Porto, Porto
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and free WiFi, as well as an LCD TV and an espresso maker. Other amenities include hypo-allergenic bedding, laundry facilities, towels, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Castelo Santa Catarina
address: Rua de Santa Catarina, 1347, 4000-457 Porto, Porto
description: Set in a castle among landscaped gardens, Castelo Santa Catarina offers accommodation in central Porto and a breakfast featuring traditional Portuguese dishes. Marques Metro Station is 100 metres away. Some of the property’s rooms boast early 20th Century decorations including ornate chest of drawers and large beds with carved headboards. Most rooms feature a private balcony, some overlooking the Mediterranean garden. Guests can sunbath in the fold-up sun loungers in garden or explore the traditional glazed tiles in the courtyard. An aperitif or cold drink can be enjoyed iat the garden. The staff at Santa Catarina Castle can assist with car rentals or arrange for pick-up and delivery of guest’s laundry. The 24-hour front desk can also organize in-room breakfast. Castelo Santa Catarina is 1.5 km away from musical shows hosted at Coliseu do Porto Theatre. Porto historic centre is 850 metres away.

name: Porto Royal Bridges Hotel
address: Rua Sa da Bandeira 53, 4000-433 Porto, Porto
description: Boasting a bar, Porto Royal Bridges Hotel is set in the centre of Porto, 200 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Porto Royal Bridges Hotel the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers an American or gluten-free breakfast. Popular points of interest near Porto Royal Bridges Hotel include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Jardins do Porto Boutique Guest House
description: Situated in Porto, Jardins do Porto Boutique Guest House features a restaurant, garden views and free WiFi, less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. Featuring a terrace, some units are air conditioned and have a dining area and a seating area with a satellite flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in some units, along with bathrobes, slippers and a hair dryer. The bed and breakfast offers a vegetarian or vegan breakfast. Guests can also relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area. Popular points of interest near Jardins do Porto Boutique Guest House include Oporto Coliseum, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hf Ipanema Park
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, this 5-star hotel offers a rooftop bar with Porto and Douro River views. The HF Ipanema Park is 1 km from Serralves Museum and Garden. The hotel provides a variety of rooms and suites, all with cable channels and Sport TV. A mini-bar, 24-hour room service and free WiFi are also featured in all air-conditioned rooms. The hotel has six charging stations for electric cars, two of which are fast-charging (22 kVa), available for an additional fee. We do not accept reservations. For more information, please contact the reception desk upon arrival! Guests can enjoy their meals at the Jardim d’Inverno Restaurant or have a snack at the Twin Trees snack bar. The seaside area of Foz do Douro, with its restaurants, bars and cafes, is a 5-minute drive. After a session at the gym, guests can enjoy a relaxing massage in our spa for an additional fee. Babysitting services are available. The Ribeira UNESCO World Heritage site is a 10-minute drive from the Ipanema Park, and Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Hotel da Música
address: Mercado do Bom Sucesso Largo Ferreira Lapa, 21 a 183, 4150-323 Porto, Porto
description: Part of Mercado do Bom Sucesso building, the design Hotel da Música offers a 24-hour reception 400 metres from Casa da Música Metro Station. It features a restaurant and bar on site. Private outdoor parking is available on site, along with a charging station for electrical vehicles. The bright rooms feature a clean design with parquet floors. There is a mini-bar and a flat-screen cable TV with pay-per-view channels. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and free toiletries. A breakfast buffet is served daily. Bom Sucesso Gourmet Restaurant offers an exclusive concept, allowing guests to pick the organic products at the market and have them cooked at the restaurant by a renowned chef. There is a multifunction room which can host up to 100 people, with the latest equipment available. Room service is also available. The kosher-certified property is a 10-minute walk from the Kadoorie Mekor Haim Synagogue. The nearby metro station offers easy access to most of Porto’s landmarks, including Clérigos Tower and Lello bookshop in a 20-minute metro ride. Porto International Airport is 13 km from Hotel da Música.

name: Portus Cale Hotel
description: Situated on Porto’s Avenida da Boavista, Portus Cale Hotel offers bright, air-conditioned rooms and a daily buffet breakfast. The Douro Riverfront is just 2 km from the hotel. Guests rooms at Portus Cale Hotel have wood furniture and cable TV. Each includes an en suite bathroom stocked a hairdryer and free bathroom amenities. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Guests can enjoy a glass of port wine in the lobby bar, which is open from 10:30 to 01:00. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception desk can arrange car rental and facilitate the on-site business centre. The famous Casa da Musica is only a 5-minute walk, while Sá Carneiro Airport is 12 km away. A tourist bus and public transport is conveniently available just outside Portus Cale.

name: Acta The Avenue
address: 188 Avenida de Fernão de Magalhães, 4300-188 Porto, Porto
description: Located in Porto, 1.1 km from Oporto Coliseum, Acta The Avenue provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Campanha Train Station. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms include a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Acta The Avenue every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near Acta The Avenue include Sao Bento Metro Station, FC Porto Museum and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Holiday Inn Express Porto City Centre
address: Rua De Santa Catarina 661/663, 4000-454 Porto, Porto
description: Modern hotel located in the heart of the city, the main street of the city close to all the attractions of the city centre of Porto. With Express Bar and Café throughout the day, free WiFi and breakfast included. The Holiday Inn Express® Porto City Centre hotel is also just a few minutes from Bolhão Market, Ribeira and its Douro River, Clérigos Church and much more, including of the cafes and restaurants of Ribeira. A taxi can take you to all the main areas of Porto within minutes. The beaches of Leça da Palmeira and its incredible seafood restaurants are places you cannot miss. Cosy up in one of our 105 air-conditioned bedrooms, which features a comfortable bed with a choice of pillows and stylish USB ports on the headboard. Free WiFi and a 40-inch flat screen TV with a wide choice of stations are available, or you can catch up on work on the handy multi-purpose desk. The Express Bar and Café are open 24 hours a day. In the morning take a seat and enjoy the Express Breakfast hot and continental buffet options at your own pace, all included in your room.At Holiday Inn Express® Porto City Centre, we look forward to welcoming you.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: HF Ipanema Porto
address: Rua do Campo Alegre, 156/172, 4150-169 Porto, Porto
description: HF Ipanema Porto is located in Boavista, 500 metres from the Boavista Roundabout. At 2.6 km from Porto's historic centre, it offers modern accommodation and 24-hour secure parking. With free WiFi, all rooms have been refurbished and include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, double-glazed windows, a mini bar, and a fully contained bathroom. Room service is also available, at an extra cost. Specially furnished family rooms are also provided. Guests can enjoy a variety of drinks at the bar. The surrounding area features various restaurant and pastry shop options. Many of the restaurants serve the city's signature dish, the Francesinha. There is an on-site business centre and a new gym. Guests can make use of the laundry facilities, babysitting services, request for car rentals, tour and excursion arrangements. At a 9-minute walk are the lush Crystal Palace Gardens, which feature panoramic Douro River and city views. The gardens are also home to a library and to the Romantic Museum. Soares dos Reis Museum is at 1 km, while the Music House is at a 10-minute walk. The Ipanema Porto is ia short drive from Aliados Avenue and from some of Porto's more well-known landmarks, such as the Clérigos Church and the São Bento Train Station.

name: Hotel Cristal Porto
address: Travesso de Antero de Quental, 360, 4000-087 Porto, Porto
description: Strategically located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Porto. Guests can also make the most of free internet throughout the property. This modern hotel offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and bicycle rental. For trendy travellers a bar provides a delightful setting for an after-meal drink. Hotel Cristal Porto provides 94 air conditioned rooms. Hot drinks can be brewed with complimentary tea and coffee supplies. Guests of Hotel Cristal Porto can relax with a drink at the in-house bar, or have a meal at Restaurante Cristal. Room service is also available during limited hours. Situated in Vinho Verde, Hotel Cristal Porto makes an ideal base for those interested in sampling the area's specialties. It is within a 20-minute walk of Trindade Metro Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Porto.Revato

name: Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace
description: Located a 3-minute walk from Paris Galleries Street, Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace offers 5-star accommodations in Porto and is located in a renovated historic building from 1923. The property has 2 restaurants, a bar, indoor swimming pool and a Spa & Wellness Centre. The hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 400 metres from City Market Bolhao and around 400 metres from Clerigos Tower. Free WiFi is available. The property features rooms and suites, all equipped with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower. All units are equipped with a seating area. Buffet breakfast is served every morning at the breakfast room. Le Monumental Café features fish and seafood options, while Le Monument is a gourmet restaurant. There is also the Bar Americain, which also serves snacks. Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace offers a range of wellness facilities including a sauna and an indoor pool, hammam and a fitness centre. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tips on the area. Le Monumental features a library lounge and a comfortable TV room. Popular points of interest near Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace include Oporto Coliseum, Ferreira Borges Market and Soares dos Reis National Museum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 11 km from Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace.

name: Porto River Infante
address: Rua Infante Dom Henrique, 36, 4050-296 Porto, Porto
description: Well situated in Porto, Porto River Infante offers an American breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Guests can make use of a bar. All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the units at Porto River Infante have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the accommodation every room includes bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Porto River Infante include Ribeira Square, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Spot Family Suites
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Spot Family Suites offers accommodation in Porto, 200 metres from City Market Bolhao. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. All rooms include a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers car hire. Oporto Coliseum is 500 metres from Hotel Spot Family Suites, while Paris Galleries Street is 700 metres away. Porto Airport is 11 km from the property.

name: Vilar Oporto Hotel
address: Rua Arcediago Van Zeller 50, 4050-621 Porto, Porto
description: Set in Porto, 1.3 km from Music House, Vilar Oporto Hotel offers accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers an ATM and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.1 km from Boavista Roundabout. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries, rooms at Vilar Oporto Hotel also feature free WiFi, while some rooms also feature a balcony. All guest rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. Guests at Vilar Oporto Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Vilar Oporto Hotel.

name: Porto River
description: Located in the historical Ribeira area, downtown Porto, Porto River is an aparthotel that offers carefully decorated apartments just a 10-minute walk from the Port Wine Cellars across the Luis I Bridge. Free WiFi is provided. The air-conditioned apartments include wooden floors, exposed stone walls and some even feature exposed wooden beams on the ceiling. Each unit offers design furniture, a flat-screen satellite TV, soundproofing and a private bathroom with bath or shower as well as free toiletries. The apartments at Porto River come with fully equipped kitchenettes allowing guests to prepare their own meals. Alternatively, guests are welcome to visit the great variety of restaurants serving traditional Porto cuisine. In the evening there are plenty of bars in the vicinity where guests can relax and enjoy the unique view. Due to its prime location, guests staying at Porto River aparthotel can easily visit most major landmarks in the centre of Porto. The iconic Clérigos Tower and the Lello Bookstore are 850 metres away while the Sé Cathedral is just a 10-minute walk away. The Aliados Avenue and the picturesque São Bento Train Station are a 13-minute walk away. Porto International Airport is 14 km away.

name: B The Guest Downtown
description: Situated in the centre of Porto, facing the Bolhão Market, B The Guest Downtown offers air-conditioned rooms with modern style décor and free WiFi in all areas. The 10 comfortable rooms offer views to the street or to the city rooftops and each includes flat-screen cable TV, a seating area, a desk and a minibar. Each has a private bathroom featuring free toiletries, a shower and a hairdryer. B The Guest Downtown has its own bar and snack bar. The breakfast can be served in the room or if guests prefer they can enjoy a breakfast buffet. A great variety of restaurants are available within 100 metres and at night guests can visit the bars 500 metres away. Guests have a great amount of facilities and services at their disposal. Dry cleaning, laundry, ironing and grocery delivery can be done for a surcharge. B The Guest provides daily maid service, room service and safety deposit box in all rooms. If guests need transportation to and from Porto International Airport, which is 17 Km away, a shuttle service can be arranged. With Bolhão Metro Station right across the street, guests can easily visit all the major attractions that Porto has to offer.

name: Porto Antas Hotel
address: Rua Padre Manuel Da Nóbrega 111, Porto, Porto
description: Situated a 5-minute walk from the FC Porto’s Dragão football stadium and the Dolce Vite Shopping, the modern Porto Antas Hotel provides free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. A 10-minute walk away is Dragão Metro Station, connecting to central Porto and the airport. The spacious, soundproof rooms are air conditioned and include floor-to-ceiling curtains and a flat-screen satellite TV. Some feature a private balcony. Each morning a buffet breakfast is served in the modern breakfast room. The bar serves a range of drinks and room service is available. The lobby features a fireplace and a computer for guests to use. Monte Aventino, with squash and tennis courts, is within a 2-minute walk, while the Dolce Vita shopping mall is 500 metres away. Combatentes Metro Station, 5 minutes’ walk from Hotel Porto Antas, connects to the university and El Corte Ingles. Central Porto is a 10-minute drive and the Francisco de Sá Carneiro Airport can be reached in less than 20 minutes. There is a garage on site.

name: Hotel Aliados
address: Rua Elisio De Melo, 27, 4000-196 Porto, Porto
description: Situated in a historic building overlooking Aliados Avenue in the Porto centre, this hotel is just 50 metres from the Aliados Metro Station. The downstairs restaurant at Hotel Aliados is the emblematic Café Guarany, which also has nightly live music. The Hotel Aliados' bright and comfortably furnished rooms feature large soundproofed windows with city views. Each is equipped with modern amenities including satellite TV and air conditioning. A private bathroom with free toiletries is included in each unit. Some rooms also have private balconies. Guests can spend a night at the downstairs Café-Restaurant Guarany, which serves international cuisine. The schedule of live music rotates each night and includes traditional Portuguese fado singers. The surrounding area features a ariety of restaurants, most serving the popular and rich Porto cuisine. The hotel’s tour desk is available to assist with car rental or in scheduling a day trip to Portugal’s Douro River region. Hotel reception is available 24 hours a day. At just 400 metres is the pedestrian street of Santa Catarina, which houses a wide range of shops and boutiques. Porto's riverside, the Ribeira, is a UNESCO World Heritage site and is a 10-minute walk away. Scenic Parque de Serralves, home of Porto’s Museum of Contemporary Art, is just 3 km from Hotel Aliados. Porto's International Airport is a 30-minute drive away and is also reachable via metro.

name: Porto Palácio Hotel by The Editory
description: Featuring a rooftop lounge with panoramic Porto and Douro River views, 5-star Porto Palacio has a luxurious spa with massage rooms, squash court, fitness centre and an indoor pool. The Casa da Musica is 8 minutes’ walk away. Decorated in a modern style, the spacious, soundproofed rooms have a 26-inch, flat-screen satellite TV, seating area and minibar. The marble private bathrooms include underfloor heating. All rooms feature free WiFi access. Located on Avenida da Boavista, Porto Palácio Hotel by The Editory is a 7-minute walk from Estádio do Bessa. Casa da Música and Francos metro stations are both less than a 15-minute walk from the hotel. The city centre is around 15 minutes’ drive away. Porto International Airport is 13.4 km from the hotel.

name: Costa do Sol Residencial
description: This hotel is situated on Santa Catarina Street, well-known for its shopping. The Marques Metro Station is 50 metres away. Costa Do Sol features a bar and rooms with a flat-screen TV. It has a classic billiards room, a TV lounge and free WiFi in all rooms. Fully air conditioned and with 24-hour room service, all accommodations at Residencial Costa Do Sol come equipped with a minibar and work desk. Each room has a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served daily in Costa Do Sol’s dining room. It includes a selection of cakes, pastries, and hot dishes. There is also a snack bar for drinks and bites during the day. The 24-hour reception staff offers a car rental service to discover Porto and its surroundings. The hotel’s position on the Rua de Santa Catarina shopping street offers convenient access to boutiques, bars and eateries. The property is conveniently located on a popular street, a 4-minute metro trip away from downtown.

name: Stay Hotel Porto Centro Trindade
description: Centrally located in Porto, Stay Hotel Porto Centro Trindade is a 3-star accommodation at a 5-minute walk from Trindade Metro Station and 10 minutes from Aliados Avenue. The Bolhão market is at 600 metres, while the iconic Clérigos Church is at a 20-minute walk. Free WiFi is included and all rooms are equipped with a flat-screen cable TV. Each room also has a kettle, wardrobe and air conditioning. All rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. A continental or buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. A wide range of restaurants is available in the vicinity, many within a 5 to 10-minute walk. Among the city's gastronomic specialities is the famed Francesinha. At 300 metres is the start of the pedestrian portion of Santa Catarina Street, a renowned shopping street which also houses the emblematic Majestic Café. At a 15-minute walk are the Paris Galleries, a popular nighttime hotspot, filled with bars and cafés. Porto's Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 16 km from the property and is reachable via metro.

name: Miragaia House
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and free WiFi. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and down comforters.Expedia

name: Vila Foz Hotel & SPA - member of Design Hotels
description: Facing the beachfront, Vila Foz Hotel & SPA - member of Design Hotels offers 5-star accommodation in Porto and has a garden, restaurant and bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as free bikes. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms include a kettle, while some rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. At Vila Foz Hotel & SPA - member of Design Hotels the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or vegetarian options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling. Vila Foz Hotel & SPA - member of Design Hotels features amenities such as an on-site business centre and hammam. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Molhe Beach, Castelo do Queijo Beach and Ingleses Beach. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 12 km from Vila Foz Hotel & SPA - member of Design Hotels, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto City House
address: Rua Beato Inácio de Azevedo 175, 4100-284 Porto, Porto
description: Porto City House features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Porto, 2.5 km from Boavista Roundabout, 2 km from Music House and 4.8 km from Clerigos Tower. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining table, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Some units include a seating area and/or a terrace. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Porto City House provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. A car rental service is available at the accommodation. Palacio da Bolsa is 5.2 km from Porto City House, while Ferreira Borges Market is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 12 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Holiday Inn Express Porto - Exponor
address: Av. Doutor Antonio Macedo 163, 4450-617 Porto, Porto
description: Friendly staff welcome you into our sleek monochrome lobby at modern Holiday Inn Express Porto-Exponor, just eight minutes’ drive from Francisco de Sá Carneiro Airport and Porto City Centre. Our location opposite the Exponor Convention Centre means you can linger over a complimentary buffet breakfast and still make it to your morning meeting in time. Just in front of the hotel, the 601 bus will take you to Porto City Centre in 20 minutes. Relax with a flat-screen TV in your contemporary guest room at Holiday Inn Express Porto-Exponor. You can catch up on email with wireless Internet at the well-lit desk, and make yourself at home with complimentary tea and coffee. Shop till you drop at the IKEA store in the enormous Mar Shopping Mall. Or cheer along with passionate local fans at nearby Dragão Stadium, Porto Football Club's home ground. It's a short drive to the vibrant nightlife of Oporto City Centre and there are several yacht clubs within walking distance of the hotel. Ask the 24-hour front desk staff at Holiday Inn Express Porto-Exponor to recommend their favourite local restaurants. After dinner, catch up with friends in our stylish Lobby Bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Convo Porto Hotel & Apartment
address: R. de Latino Coelho 244, 4000-314 Porto, Porto
description: Situated in Porto and with Oporto Coliseum reachable within 1.7 km, The Convo Porto Hotel & Apartment features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. Attractively located in the Bonfim district, this hotel provides a bar. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Rooms are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms include a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At The Convo Porto Hotel & Apartment the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and gluten-free options. FC Porto Museum is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from The Convo Porto Hotel & Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: AC Hotel Porto by Marriott
description: Our accommodation in Porto features facilities and infrastructures of the highest quality, and is located in one of the oldest and richest cities in Portugal, home of the world renowned Port Wine. This hotel is situated just 300 metres from the Estádio do Dragão, soccer stadium, and its metro station in the Antas District has an easy and quick access to the city centre, airport and train Station. It is also close to a shopping center with more than 80 shops and restaurants, perfect for enjoying a dinner or going shopping. AC Hotel Porto is a modern and welcoming hotel which includes AC Lounge, temporary limited schedule, fully equipped fitness center, business centre, and several event rooms which can serve to hold anything from business meetings to conferences. Our qualified staff is here to help you organize a successful event. RNET nº 788Marriott

name: Axis Porto Business & Spa Hotel
description: Axis Porto Hotel is situated beside Porto University campus, 3 km from the UNESCO World Heritage Centre of Porto. The hotel features a spa centre and panoramic city views. All guest rooms at the Axis Porto feature satellite TV, minibar and air conditioning. In addition, the hotel rooms all have balconies. The hotel’s modern spa is equipped with a dynamic pool, sauna, Turkish baths and shower. A full range of relaxation and massage treatments is available. The restaurant at Hotel Axis Porto offers a fusion of Italian and international cuisine. There is also a living room and a terrace with a bar, where guests can relax with a drink. Axis Porto Business & Spa Hotel is located just 15 minutes’ drive from Porto International Airport. The nearest Metro station is 900 metres away, and on-site car parking is also available. Axis is taking part in an initiative of corporate social responsibility, integrating into its team people with intellectual disabilities.

name: 1872 River House by Olivia
address: Rua do Infante D. Henrique, 133, 4050-298 Porto, Porto
description: Located right in front of the Douro River, 1872 River House by Olivia provides scenic views over the riverside area, as well as of the Luis I Bridge. The historical Ribeira area is 100 metres away and the Porto centre is 1.2 km. The air-conditioned rooms are classically decorated and feature a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have city views while others boast views over the river. All include free WiFi and a private bathroom. Daily cleaning is provided. Breakfast is included in the room rate and served each morning in the property’s bright meal area. Room breakfast is available, at an extra fee. The Porto Ribeira area is a popular tourist destination, filled with traditional restaurants, bars and eateries. Guests may rent bicycles with the front desk in order to tour the waterfront promenade in leisurely fashion. Babysitting services are available, at an extra cost. Also at an extra fee, guided tours of the city are provided for guests of the River House. Central Aliados Avenue is a 13-minute walk and features several shops and typical cafés. The iconic Clérigos Tower is 900 metres away, as are the Galerias de Paris bar area. The Gaia riverside is 1.3 km away by crossing the bridge and is the site of the Port Wine Cellars. Porto International Airport is 22 km from the charming 1872 River House by Olivia.

name: Hotel Tipografia do Conto by Casa do Conto
address: Rua de Alvares Cabral, 28, 4050-040 Porto, Porto
description: Featuring a garden, bar and views of city, Hotel Tipografia do Conto by Casa do Conto is located in Porto, 1.2 km from Clerigos Tower. With an outdoor swimming pool, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room comes with a kettle, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with garden views. At Hotel Tipografia do Conto by Casa do Conto every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near Hotel Tipografia do Conto by Casa do Conto include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Charming Antas House
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and a billiards table. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a memory foam bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Gran Cruz House
address: Praça da Ribeira, Viela do Buraco nº.19, 4050-132 Porto, Porto
description: Ideally located in the centre of Porto, Gran Cruz House offers continental breakfast and free WiFi. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is set 90 metres from Ribeira Square. The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Gran Cruz House the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Gran Cruz House include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the guest house, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ga Palace Hotel & Spa, A Xixth-Century Villa
description: Boasting a shared lounge, a restaurant as well as a bar, Hotel GA Palace is situated in the centre of Porto, 600 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation features an ATM, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, while some rooms include a balcony and others also boast city views. At Hotel GA Palace each room has bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including an indoor pool, a fitness centre and a sauna, or in the garden. Popular points of interest near Hotel GA Palace include Sao Bento Train Station, Ribeira Square and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Armazém Luxury Housing
address: Largo De São Domingos Nº 74, 4050-545 Porto, Porto
description: Located in an old iron warehouse from the 19th century, Armazem Luxury Housing- Architectural & Design Hotel is located in the historic centre of Porto, declared a world heritage site by UNESCO, and features a terrace overlooking the city. This guesthouse features double rooms, twin rooms, suites and a penthouse, all equipped with a TV, a coffee machine, bathrobes and slippers. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. A breakfast buffet is served every morning at the dining room or in the inner courtyard. There is a communal living room with a bar at the property, and a variety of restaurants and cafés can be found in the vicinity. The iconic Clérigos Tower is just 7-minute walk, while the Ribeira area is 500 metres from the property and the emblematic Luis I Bridge is 600 metros away. Porto international Airport is 17 km from Armazem Luxury Housing- Architectural & Design Hotel.

name: Oporto Loft
address: Rua D. Manuel II, 178, 4050-343 Porto, Porto
description: Oporto Loft is a comfortable base when visiting Porto and is close to everything the area has to offer. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The hotel features a 24/7 reception, plus free Wi-Fi and wine tasting. For added convenience, it offers an exhibit space, meeting rooms and limited hours room service. Oporto Loft offers 4 rooms, all of which are equipped with a rain shower, a mini bar and tea and coffee making facilities. They are also fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hair dryer. Guests of Oporto Loft can enjoy a continental breakfast, which is served each morning. The hotel is ideally located in Vinho Verde, allowing guests to easily try the area's specialities. It is within a 20-minute walk of Sao Bento Railway Station and Trindade Metro Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Porto.Revato

name: Casa da Marechal - Boutique Hotel by Oporto Collection - Adults Only
address: Rua do Marechal Saldanha 422, 4150-657 Porto, Porto
description: Located in Porto, 300 metres from Molhe Beach, Casa da Marechal - Boutique Hotel by Oporto Collection - Adults Only provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 500 metres from Ingleses Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At Casa da Marechal - Boutique Hotel by Oporto Collection - Adults Only every room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Casa da Marechal - Boutique Hotel by Oporto Collection - Adults Only offers 4-star accommodation with a hammam and spa centre. Carneiro Beach is 1.2 km from the hotel, while Boavista Roundabout is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from Casa da Marechal - Boutique Hotel by Oporto Collection - Adults Only.

name: Hotel Internacional Porto
description: Occupying a 19th-century building in Porto’s historical centre, Hotel Internacional features traditional Portuguese décor and an award-winning restaurant serving local gastronomy. The wine cellar houses a cosy bar. Rooms at the Hotel Internacional Porto have floor-to-ceiling, double-glazed windows and a private bathroom with a tub. Each room also has a satellite TV. A daily breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s dining room, while Restaurant O Almada offers traditional flavours from Portugal. Guests can sample regional wines at O Almadinha Bar, as well as quick meals. São Bento Train Station, at only 300 metres, offers easy connection to Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport. Aliados Metro Station is just 2 minutes’ walk away and there is a paid parking garage 50 metres from the hotel.

name: Pensao Favorita
description: No description found

name: Eurostars Oporto
address: Rua do Mestre Guilherme Camarinha, 212, Porto, Porto
description: Eurostars Oporto is a modern design hotel located 100 metres from Hospital São João Metro. The hotel offers a breakfast daily, contemporary rooms and free Wi-Fi in public areas. All guest rooms at Eurostars Oporto have hardwood floors and flatscreen TVs. Each has a private balcony and a tiled en suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a glass of local Porto wine in the bar. Regional and international meals can be enjoyed in the privacy of the guest rooms. The 24-hour front desk can help with car and bicycle rental. Matosinho Beach is only 8 km away, and Oporto’s Dragao Football Stadium just 3 km. This Eurostars Hotel is conveniently located 10 minutes’ Metro journey from Porto’s historic centre. It is 10 minutes’ drive from Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport.

name: Hotel Porto Rico
description: Set in a historical building with a tiled façade, Porto Rico is centrally located in Porto, just 100 metres from Aliados Metro Station. It features a 24-hour reception and rooms with a private balcony. The air-conditioned rooms at the Residencial Porto Rico combine classic décor with modern facilities. All rooms have a TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Breakfast is served on the terrace during the warmer months and the bar provides a selection of Porto wines. Many cafes and restaurants are situated along Avenida dos Aliados and around the nearby Town Hall. Free Wi-Fi is available in Residencial Porto Rico’s public areas. The guest house also offers laundry facilities and room service. The Oporto Cathedral is less than a 10-minute walk away and the iconic Casa da Musica is 4 metro stops from the Porto Rico.

name: BessaHotel Boavista
address: Rua Dr Marques De Carvalho, 111, 4100-325 Porto, Porto
description: Centrally located in Porto’s prestigious Boavista district, a few minutes’ from Casa da Musica, BessaHotel offers a fitness centre and a Turkish bath. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The air-conditioned luxurious rooms of BessaHotel are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have a work desk and a satellite/cable flat screen TV with Chromecast connectivity and video on demand. Some rooms have large terrace-style balconies with views of the city. Featuring a 24-hour reception, BessaHotel provides a business centre. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and laundry facilities. BessaHotel is 200 metres from Bessa Stadium and 1.6 km from Serralves Contemporary Art Museum. The Francos Metro Station is 1 km away and Porto International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Residencial Caldeira
address: Campo Mártires Da Pátria, 53, 4050-366 Porto, Porto
description: Residencial Caldeira is situated in the historical centre of Porto. Housed in a romantic-style 19th century house, it offers simply furnished rooms with en suite bathrooms and TVs.As well as a 24-hour front desk. The Residencial is located approximately 5 minutes’ walk from the Avenida dos Aliados and the São Bento Train Station. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport can be found just 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Vera Cruz Porto Downtown Hotel
description: Located 50 metres from Aliados Metro Station in the heart of Porto’s historic city centre. Vera Cruz Hotel offers a rooftop terrace with views across the Aliados Avenue and a 24-hour front desk. The air-conditioned rooms at the Vera Cruz Hotel have double-glazed windows, satellite TV and private bathrooms with luxury amenities. Some rooms have a spacious work desk, and suites have private balconies. Continental breakfast is prepared with local ingredients and can be enjoyed on the rooftop terrace. There are also many restaurants and bars within a few minutes’ walk. By metro, Vera Cruz Hotel is 30 minutes' away from the Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport and by car, it is a 15 minutes' drive away.

name: Pao de Acucar Hotel
description: Located in Porto’s historic centre, 100 metres from Avenida dos Aliados and the Metro station, this hotel offers art déco-style interiors, a multilingual staff and a spacious terrace. The Douro River is 15 minutes’ walk away. All rooms at Pão de Açúcar Hotel feature double-glazed windows, vintage furnishings and include a private bathroom. Every room has air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar, and some rooms also feature a terrace. Breakfast is served daily, guests can enjoy it in the breakfast room or on the terrace, which overlooks the historical Porto City Hall building. There are many restaurants and bars within a few minutes’ walk. Guests can relax with a book borrowed from the hotel’s library, or visit the old toy and retro collection, with vintage bumper cars from the 70's. From Pão de Açúcar, you can enjoy a short walk to the Port Wine Cellars and taste some of the world-famous Port Wine. Sao Bento Railway Station is 500 metres away. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is a 15-minute drive away, and 30 minutes by metro. Car parking is available nearby for an additional fee.

name: The Passenger Hostel
address: Estacao de Sao Bento, 4000-069 Porto, Porto
description: The Passenger Hostel is located in the iconic S. Bento Train Station, within the UNESCO World Heritage area of Porto. It offers private and shared accommodation, a bar and free WiFi access. Dorm rooms feature a private locker for each guest, a curtain for more privacy, a bedside power socket and an individual light. All rooms have access to shared bathrooms with a shower and a hairdryer. All guests can use the shared kitchen, and the area is filled with dining options. There is a washing machine and tumble dryer for guests’ use. Douro riverside is a 15-minute walk from The Passenger, and Galerias de Paris street is 400 metres. Santa Catarina shopping street is less than 5 minutes’ walking. Porto International Airport is around 16 km away, and S. Bento Metro Station is at the doorstep.

name: Hotel Premium Porto Downtown
address: Av. Rodrigues De Freitas 427, 4000-423 Porto, Porto
description: Premium Porto Downtown is located in Porto's historical centre, 800 metres from Aliados Avenue. The modern and tranquil 4-star hotel has a sun terrace with scenic views, where guests can relax while enjoying a drink from the bar. Every one of the 56 modern and elegant rooms at this hotel is air conditioned and fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar, safe, work desk and free WiFi access. All rooms come with a private bathroom which includes a hairdryer. Superior rooms also come with a bathtub and a coffee machine. Room breakfast is available, at an extra fee. Alternatively, those wishing to try out the local gastronomy can visit one of the many Porto restaurants available within a short 5-minute walk. The Porto Coliseum is 300 metres away from the hotel. The iconic Clérigos Tower is at a 10-minute walk, as are the lively bars and restaurants of Galerias de Paris. 650 metres away is São Bento Train Station. Dom Luis I Bridge is a 10-minute walk and connects with the site of the Port Wine Cellars. Premium Porto Downtown is 18 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport. A shuttle service from the airport is provided, upon previous request and at an extra fee.

name: Boavista Class Inn
description: Located in a restored 2-storey house, Boavista Class Inn offers contemporary and sober accommodation in Porto. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and the indoor courtyard. Rooms have a flat-screen TV, free WiFi and views of the interior courtyard or to Casa da Música. Every room has a private bathroom. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Music House is 50 metres from Boavista Class Inn, while Casa da Musica Metro Station is 100 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Pimms Home Ribeira
address: 109 Rua do Infante Dom Henrique, 4050-561 Porto, Porto
description: Located in Porto, Pimms Home Ribeira provides free WiFi, and guests can enjoy a restaurant, a bar and a shared lounge. The bed and breakfast offers a TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free toiletries and shower. Popular points of interest near Pimms Home Ribeira include Ribeira Square, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Paulista
description: Situated opposite the Aliados Metro Station and next to Porto City Hall, Hotel Paulista features free Wi-Fi and rooms with satellite TV. The hotel Paulista offers breakfast, at an additional cost. All rooms at Paulista are equipped with a telephone and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some rooms also have air conditioning, The hotel has an elevator, but there are rooms accessible by stairs. There are several restaurants and cafes near the hotel. At the hotel reception you can buy tickets for tours around the city. Airport service available at an additional cost. There is a garage on a nearby street, at an additional cost. A direct connection to Porto Airport is provided by the Trindade Metro Station, a 5-minute walk away from the hotel. Oporto Cathedral and the Torre dos Clérigos are less than a 10-minute walk away.

name: Dukes Corner Guest House
address: Rua Duque da Terceira, 93, 4000-008 Porto, Porto
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and an LED TV, as well as a garden and climate control. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a memory foam bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Pensão França
description: No description found

name: Porto Domus Hotel
description: Located in Porto, the Porto Domus Hotel is 1 km away from the Trindade Railway Station. It has a bar, and offers modern air-conditioned rooms with cable TV. Porto Domus Hotel rooms are bright. They have simple furnishings, and come equipped with a mini bar. Each en suite bathroom includes amenities and a hairdryer. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with car rental, and provide information on local attractions. Porto Domus Hotel also offers a laundry service. The hotel is 300 metres from the Campo 24 de Agosto Metro Station. Nearby leisure activities include boat tours of the Douro River. The airport is 10 km away.

name: Hospes Infante Sagres Porto
address: Praca D. Filipa de Lencastre 62, 4050-259 Porto, Porto
description: This historic 5-star hotel, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World, is located in central Porto, a 4-minute walk from Aliados Metro Station. Renovated in early 2018, the hotel has antique chandeliers in its public areas and also features the newly-opened Scarlett Brasserie & Wine Bar. The soundproofed rooms and suites of the Hotel Infante De Sagres feature custom-made furnishings. The classical décor comes together with satellite flat-screen TVs and air conditioning. A wide range of popular restaurants and eateries is available within a short walk from the property. Just 200 metres away are Galerias de Paris, a hip area which has a range of popular bars, shops and restaurants. The historic property also features a sundeck, with a plunge pool and sun loungers. Situated in Porto’s UNESCO Heritage city centre, Infante De Sagres is a 10-minute walk from the Cathedral and a 10-minute drive from Rem Koolhaas's Casa da Mùsica Concert Hall. At a 14-minute walk is the top of the iconic Dom Luís I Bridge, which provides scenic views over the Douro River and the city. A shuttle can be arranged for Francisco de Sá Carneiro Airport, which is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Peninsular- Porto
address: Rua Sa da Bandeira, 21, 4000-433 Porto, Porto
description: Hotel Peninsular- Porto occupies a prime location in the UNESCO heritage site of Porto old town, just 200 metres from Sao Bento railway station. The hotel has a restaurant, is 350 metres from the Clérigos Church and a 5-minute walk from the Lello Bookshop. All rooms feature a private en suite bathroom. Hotel Peninsular- Porto’s bedrooms have a neutral, rustic décor and are equipped with antique wooden furniture. Some rooms also include a balcony and/or views. Breakfast is served each morning in the downstairs restaurant, which is decorated in traditional Portuguese tiles. There are also many cafés and restaurants within a few minutes’ walk of the hotel. The hotel staff can help you arrange tickets for the hop-on, hop-off bus tour of Porto. Hotel Peninsular- Porto is located just 3 minutes’ walk from the famous Rua de Santa Catarina shopping street. São Bento Metro Station is just 3 minutes’ walk away. Hotel Peninsular- Porto is 17 km from Porto International Airport.

name: Decanting Porto House
description: Combining a central location in Porto with an historical building, a patio and modern rooms, the Decating Porto House is 2 minutes’ walking from Bolhão Metro Station. Wine tours, city tours and wine tastings, all tailored to each guest, can be organized, upon request. This wine-themed hotel has 4 floors features air-conditioned rooms with a clean décor, wooden floors, a flat-screen cable TV and an armchair. Each headboard has wooden boards recycled from wine crates. The private bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer on request. Free WiFi is available. The unit has a traditional staircase with a skylight. A continental breakfast is available every morning and can be served indoors or on the decked area facing the patio, weather permitting. Breakfast includes a variety of homemade products, made with local ingredients. The central location of the Decating Porto House allows guests to easily explore Porto cuisine in any of the surrounding options. Santa Catarina shopping street is a few steps away, and the iconic Torre dos Clérigos is 15 minutes’ walking. The historical Majestic Café is 500 metres from the Porto House. Porto International Airport is within a 50-minute metro ride from Trindade Metro Station, located less than 10 minutes’ walking. Decanting Porto House also provides an airport shuttle service upon request and at a surcharge.

name: Residencial Visconde
description: Set in the Marquês area in Porto, the Hotel Visconde unit has a Metro Station under a 2-minute walk away. The Porto centre, in the Aliados Avenue is a 4-minute drive from the property. The air-conditioned rooms at the Visconde come equipped with a private bathroom, satellite TV, telephone and free WiFi. A breakfast buffet is served each morning in the Hotel Visconde. The nearest restaurant is just 100 metres from the property and the Porto centre has a multitude of restaurants serving traditional meals, including the city’s signature dishes, Francesinha and Tripas à Moda do Porto. Guests can relax in the lounge area and access the internet, sit on the comfortable sofas or watch some TV. Santa Catarina Street is Porto’s most active commercial street and is a 20-minute walk away. Dom Luis I Bridge is a 9-minute drive and connects with neighbouring Vila Nova de Gaia, where the Port Wine Cellars are sited. The iconic Clérigos Tower is a 7-minute drive away, as is the famed Lello Bookstore, which was recently voted as one of the most beautiful in the world. The Galerias de Paris is Porto’s main nightlife hotspot and is accessible through an 8-minute drive. The Porto International Airport is a 12-minute drive from the Hotel Visconde.

name: Hotel da Bolsa
description: Hotel da Bolsa is nestled within Porto’s historic Ribeira district, just 100 metres from the neoclassical Palácio da Bolsa (Stock Exchange Palace). It offers breakfast and rooms with free Wi-Fi. Many of Porto’s historic highlights are within short walking distance from the hotel, such as the Sé Do Porto Cathedral and the double-decked Dom Luis arch bridge spanning the Douro River. Da Bolsa’s rooms are all soundproofed and fitted with a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Each is equipped with satellite TV, safe box and air conditioning. Allergy-free rooms are also available. Da Bolsa Hotel serves a buffet breakfast in its dining room or to the guest rooms. The hotel’s well-stocked bar provides local wines and spirits and plenty of seating to socialise or connect to the internet. Bolsa’s helpful staff can direct guests to Douro River cruises or arrange rental cars. Sao Bento Railway Station and Tram Stop are both just 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Seculo Hotel
address: Rua de Santa Catarina, 1256, 4000-447 Porto, Porto
description: Situated on the famous Rua de Santa Catarina, Século Hotel is conveniently located for shopping, public transport and the UNESCO centre of Porto. There is free Wi-Fi in public areas. All the air-conditioned rooms at the Século Hotel feature a flat-screen cable TV and a safety deposit box. Each unit has a private bathroom and a minibar. The hotel also has its own bar and a rooftop sun terrace where guests can relax. A small fitness centre is also available for the sport lovers. Século Hotel is located on one of Portugal's most popular shopping streets. Many museums are also just a short walk away, including the Natural History Museum and the Photography Museum. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the train station and a 5-minute walk from the Metro station. Porto Airport is 15 km away. A free on-site park is also available.

name: Hotel Poveira
description: Set 50 metres from the Campanhã Train and Metro Station, Poveira Hotel is a family-run guest house in Porto. Situated in a historic building, it offers a well-stocked bar and a coffee shop. The simply furnished air-conditioned rooms are fitted with double-glazed windows and a work desk. Each has cable TV and a telephone. Some rooms include balconies. Poveira Hotel is just a short train or metro ride from the centre of Porto and the Douro waterfront. The beach can be reached within 15 minutes. Underground parking is available 50 metres from the property.

name: Casa Antiga
address: 382 Rua de Miguel Bombarda, 4050-378 Porto, Porto
description: Conveniently located in Porto, Casa Antiga offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. All guest rooms in the guest house are fitted with a kettle. Casa Antiga features some units that feature a balcony and garden view, and all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and a desk. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Casa Antiga include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from the guest house.

name: Hotel Sao Jose
description: Situated in the heart of Porto’s old town, a 5-minute walk from City Market Bolhao, this hotel offers free Wi-Fi and a central location beside the shopping street Rua Santa Catarina. The spacious guest rooms of Hotel São José are traditionally furnished and feature satellite TV, a minibar and air conditioning. Some rooms include a balcony. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Ribeira UNESCO World Heritage site and a 15-minute drive from the Miramar Beach. The São José Hotel features a tour desk from where excursions can be arranged. These include the Porto City Tour, the Wine Cellar Tour and the Douro River Cruise. Guests can benefit from the hotel’s 24-hour front desk. Drinks and refreshments are available from São José Hotel’s bar.

name: Hotel das Virtudes
address: Rua São Pedro de Miragaia nº 60, 4050-565 Porto, Porto
description: Well located in Porto, Hotel das Virtudes provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer city views. All rooms include a safety deposit box. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hotel das Virtudes include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Miradaire Porto
description: Centrally located in Porto, this charming hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a rich breakfast prepared with local ingredients. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The rooms at Hotel Mira D'Aire are decorated with dark wooden furnishings and are fully air conditioned. They include a tea/coffee maker, a work desk and a private bathroom. A breakfast buffet is served daily at the hotel. The friendly staff at Mira D'Aire can offer advice on local activities. After a day of exploring the area, guests can enjoy a refreshing drink at the bar. Bicycle rental and laundry services are among the convenient facilities offered by the Hotel Mira. Lapa Metro Station is located just a few minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: Boavista Eco-Luxury House
description: Set in Porto and with Boavista Roundabout reachable within 500 metres, Boavista Eco-Luxury House offers express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFithroughout the property and a terrace. Featuring luggage storage space, this property also has a restaurant and a picnic area. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Music House. The units at the guest house come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath, bathrobes and slippers. Boavista Eco-Luxury House features certain units with garden views, and the rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or vegan options. Clerigos Tower is 3.6 km from Boavista Eco-Luxury House, while Palacio da Bolsa is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 12 km from the guest house.

name: Hotel Carris Porto Ribeira
address: Rua do Infante D. Henrique, 1, 4050-296 Porto, Porto
description: This 4-star hotel is located in the heart of the historic centre of Porto, next to Praa da Ribeira, the Palcio da Bolsa and the Alfndega Congress Centre. You will find a unique environment, with magnificent views, many terraces and charming places.With a modern and elegant design, our rooms are taken care of down to the very last detail. The hotel terraces will also allow you to enjoy a unique view of the Douro river.Our restaurants have the best Galician-Portuguese gastronomic offer to enjoy in an exclusive atmosphere, either alone or in good company.We have spaces designed specifically for the celebration of all kinds of social or business events, prepared and equipped with the best facilities.The hotel has excellent communications. BUS AND TAXI: There is a bus stop and a taxi rank in front of the hotel. TRAIN AND METRO: So Bento train and metro station is 600 metres away. AIRPORT: Francisco S Carneiro Airport is 12 km away. PRIVATE TRANSPORTATION: The city has a private transport service available through the mobile applications of each company. PARKING: In the city of Porto it is possible to find public parking on the streets. However, for your convenience and because we are located in a historical area, we recommend that you leave your car in a guarded car park. Parking Alfndega: located 500 metres from the Hotel. Parking Ribeira SABA: located 130 metres from the Hotel.iHotelier/iStay

name: Bfresh Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking
description: Located in Porto, 1.3 km from Music House, BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers a business centre, a concierge service and free WiFi. A terrace, an on-site bar and shared lounge are available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room comes with a kettle, while certain rooms include a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a toaster. At BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Boavista Roundabout is 1.3 km from the hotel, while Clerigos Tower is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 13 km from BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Supernova - Hostel
address: Rua Guedes De Azevedo 219, 4000-273 Porto, Porto
description: Located in Porto historic centre, the SUPERNOVA - Hostel & Café hostel is a 1-minute walk from the central Trindade Metro Station. This renovated and charming hostel has a 24-hour front desk, a bar, as well as high-speed free WiFi access. The modern rooms at SUPERNOVA - Hostel & Café have either a private bathroom or access to shared bathroom facilities. Some have balconies. They also feature wooden floors and individual reading lights. Dormitories feature bunk beds, wooden floors and access to shared bathroom facilities. Guests can find restaurants and bars within 100 metres. The famed Santa Catarina shopping street is at a 5-minute walk and has an assortment of eateries. The Clérigos Tower is a 10-minute walk, as is the Galerias de Paris nightlife spot. Staff at the reception can arrange an airport shuttle to Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport, 16 km away.

name: Hotel Palanca
description: This hotel offers free parking just 1 km from the centre of Porto, and is a 5-minute walk away from the Marques Metro Station. The rooms are air-conditioned and there is a 24-hour reception service. All elevator-accessible and simply furnished rooms at Hotel Palanca come equipped with cable TV. Each room has a private bathroom with a bathtub or shower. A continental breakfast is available in Palanca’s breakfast room or through room service. There is also a living room with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV, and a spacious bar for drinks. The Palanca is located around the corner from the Quinta do Covelo Park, and a 15-minute walk from the Fernando Pessoa University. Car rentals can be arranged at the reception.

name: Porto Wine Hostel
address: Campo Martires Da Patria, No 52, 4050-366 Porto, Porto
description: Located in front of Clérigos Tower, this modern hostel is decorated in the colours of the famous Port wine. There is a communal kitchen and a living room with cable TV and DVD player. The rooms and spacious dorms at Wine Hostel come with brightly-coloured walls and lots of natural daylight. Each is equipped with individual lamps, a fan and heating. Breakfast is available daily. For lunch and dinner, guests can use the fully equipped kitchen or explore the numerous restaurants and bars surrounding the Wine Hostel. Free maps and area information are available in the lobby. In addition, there are 2 internet computers and washing and drying machines for laundry. The hostel can arrange bike rentals and airport transfers to Porto Airport. The hostel is located on Cordoaria Square, from where buses 601 and 602 offer a direct connection to the airport.

name: Yotel Porto
address: Rua de Gonçalo Cristóvão 206, 4000-265 Porto, Porto
description: Set in Porto, 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, YOTEL Porto offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. All rooms come with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views. At YOTEL Porto rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near YOTEL Porto include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Nice Way Porto Hostel
description: Located in the historical Aliados area, Nice Way Porto Hostel offers accommodation in downtown Porto, a 3-minute walk from the São Bento Train Station. Free WiFi is provided throughout the hostel and luggage storage and lockers are offered. Featuring private double or twin rooms and shared dormitories, some rooms at the property include en suite bathrooms and other offer access to shared bathroom facilities. Linen are provided. A daily breakfast is served at Nice Way Porto Hostel. Guests can prepare their meals in the shared equipped kitchen or enjoy a drink at the on-site cocktail bar. Alternatively, a variety of restaurants and cafés can be found in the vicinity. There is a 24-hour desk for guests’ convenience. After a day of sightseeing, guests are invited to relax in the shared living room fitted with a cable TV or peruse a book at the hostel’s library. The Nice Way Porto Hostel is a 3-minute walk from the Aliados Metro Station and 800 metres from the banks of the River Douro. Porto International Airport is 16 km away, and the hostel provides a shuttle service at an additional charge.

name: Legendary Porto Hotel
description: Centrally located on Batalha Square, Legendary Porto Hotel is a 5-minute walk from São Bento Metro Station. The recently-renovated property features a bar and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. The soundproofed rooms at Legendary Porto Hotel have new furnishings and blackout curtains. Each comes equipped with tea and coffee-making facilities and include a seating area with sofa and a flat-screen TV. En suite bathrooms come with hairdryer. The Legendary's breakfast area was also subject of a full renovation, including brand new buffet equipment where the daily continental breakfast is served. Gluten and lactose free options are available for breakfast upon previous request. Guests are welcome to discover the wide range of popular restaurants and eateries in the surrounding area, many of which serving traditional Porto delicacies. The property's lifts were subject of a full renovation and are now silent and ecological. Guests can relax in the contemporary lounge with flat-screen TVs. An attentive staff can help with car rental and laundry facilities and is available 24/7. The hotel also features a small fitness centre, which is available to guests 24/7. A 30 minute-drive from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, Legendary Porto Hotel is also a 7-minute walk from Bolhão Metro Station. The renowned Porto Wine Cellars are less than 3 km away, and the promenade on the Douro River with the iconic D. Luís Bridge is 300 metres away.

name: Hotel Porto Nobre
description: Set in a quiet area to the north of the centre of Porto, this hotel offers rooms with private bathrooms and free Wi-Fi. About 800 metres away, IPO Metro Station provides links to the central Trindade. Porto Nobre offers free on-site parking. It is located about 500 metres from the junction between the A20 and the A3. Buses stops just outside the door, connecting to the centre and the Boavista area. Cable TV is provided in all rooms at Porto Nobre. The rooms are decorated in traditional style, with wooden furniture, and fabrics in neutral colours. 24-hour front desk and luggage storage are available. Porto Nobre has a cosy bar, where continental breakfast is served each morning.

name: Rivoli Cinema Hostel
address: Rua Dr. Magalhaes Lemos, 83, 4000-332 Porto, Porto
description: This hostel is located in the historical Aliados area in downtown Porto, in a restored 1930’s Art Deco building. It is 300 metres from the Porto Train Station and includes free Wi-Fi for all guests. The bright rooms at the Rivoli Cinema Hostel have wooden floors and are all individually designed with film-inspired decor. Each has a shared bathroom and a balcony. A free buffet breakfast is served every day. There is also a shared kitchen as well as barbecue facilities on-site, and a wide variety of cafés and restaurants are within 5-minutes’ walking distance of the hostel. A spacious outdoor terrace with an inflatable swimming pool in summer is available for all guests. The shared lounge area has a Wii console as well as a DVD library. The Rivoli Cinema Hostel is 250 metres from the Aliados Metro Station and just over 800 metres from the banks of the River Douro.

name: Grande Hotel Paris By Stay Hotels
description: Attractively situated in the centre of Porto, GRANDE HOTEL PARIS by STAY HOTELS features air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms have a wardrobe. Guests at GRANDE HOTEL PARIS by STAY HOTELS can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near GRANDE HOTEL PARIS by STAY HOTELS include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the hotel.
